questions.question: Which SQL command is used to change existing data in a table?
questions.answer: UPDATE

questions.question: Which keyword is used to specify the new value in an UPDATE query?
questions.answer: SET

questions.question: Which clause is required to limit an UPDATE to specific rows?
questions.answer: WHERE

questions.question: What will happen if you run UPDATE without WHERE clause?
options: Only first row will be updated
questions.answer: All rows will be updated

questions.question: Which statement updates the salary of all employees to 5000?
questions.answer: UPDATE employees SET salary = 5000;

questions.question: Which operator is used to assign a new value in an UPDATE?
What is the correct order of keywords in an UPDATE statement?
questions.answer: UPDATE → SET → WHERE

questions.question: Which part of this statement is the condition? UPDATE students SET grade = 'A' WHERE id = 1;
questions.answer: WHERE id = 1

questions.question: Which clause helps avoid unintentional updates of all rows?
questions.answer: WHERE

questions.question: What is updated in: UPDATE users SET name = 'John' WHERE id = 5;
questions.answer: User name with ID 5

questions.question: Update the 'status' column to 'active' where 'id' is 101.
options: UPDATE users SET status = 'active' WHERE id = 101;
SET status = 'active' IN users WHERE id = 101;
MODIFY users SET status = 'active' WHERE id = 101;
questions.answer: UPDATE users SET status = 'active' WHERE id = 101;

questions.question: How would you change the age of a student with ID 22 to 19?
options: UPDATE students SET age = 19 WHERE id = 22;
CHANGE age = 19 FROM students WHERE id = 22;
questions.answer: UPDATE students SET age = 19 WHERE id = 22;

questions.question: Update email to 'test@example.com' for user named 'Raj'.
options: UPDATE users SET email = 'test@example.com' WHERE name = 'Raj';
MODIFY users email TO 'test@example.com' WHERE name = 'Raj';
SET email = 'test@example.com' IN users WHERE name = 'Raj';
questions.answer: UPDATE users SET email = 'test@example.com' WHERE name = 'Raj';

questions.question: Which command updates price to 250 for product ID 3?
options: UPDATE products SET price = 250 WHERE id = 3;
SET price TO 250 FOR product id 3;
questions.answer: UPDATE products SET price = 250 WHERE id = 3;

questions.question: You want to reset login attempts to 0 for user ID 7.
options: UPDATE users SET login_attempts = 0 WHERE id = 7;
UPDATE login_attempts = 0 IN users WHERE id = 7;
questions.answer: UPDATE users SET login_attempts = 0 WHERE id = 7;

questions.question: Which command updates the column 'active' to FALSE for users not verified?
options: UPDATE users SET active = FALSE WHERE verified = 0;
MODIFY users SET active = FALSE WHEN verified = 0;
CHANGE active TO FALSE IN users;
questions.answer: UPDATE users SET active = FALSE WHERE verified = 0;

questions.question: Update name to 'Asha' where user_id is 2001.
options: UPDATE users SET name = 'Asha' WHERE user_id = 2001;
SET name = 'Asha' IN users WHERE user_id = 2001;
questions.answer: UPDATE users SET name = 'Asha' WHERE user_id = 2001;

questions.question: How would you update a student's grade to 'B+' if score is above 80?
options: UPDATE students SET grade = 'B+' WHERE score > 80;
MODIFY students grade TO 'B+' WHERE score > 80;
questions.answer: UPDATE students SET grade = 'B+' WHERE score > 80;

questions.question: Update contact_number to NULL for entries with no name.
options: UPDATE contacts SET contact_number = NULL WHERE name IS NULL;
UPDATE contacts SET contact_number NULL WHERE name IS NULL;
SET contact_number = NULL WHERE name IS NULL;
MODIFY contacts SET contact_number TO NULL IF name IS NULL;
questions.answer: UPDATE contacts SET contact_number = NULL WHERE name IS NULL;

questions.question: Change address to 'Delhi' for customer ID 15.
options: UPDATE customers SET address = 'Delhi' WHERE id = 15;
questions.answer: UPDATE customers SET address = 'Delhi' WHERE id = 15;

questions.question: Increase score by 5 where student_id is 17.
options: UPDATE students SET score = score + 5 WHERE student_id = 17;
UPDATE students SET score + 5 WHERE student_id = 17;
questions.answer: UPDATE students SET score = score + 5 WHERE student_id = 17;

questions.question: Reduce quantity by 1 for product 'Notebook'.
options: UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE product = 'Notebook';
MODIFY inventory quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE product = 'Notebook';
SET inventory quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE product = 'Notebook';
questions.answer: UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE product = 'Notebook';

questions.question: Reset password to NULL where password reset is requested.
options: UPDATE users SET password = NULL WHERE reset_requested = 1;
MODIFY users password NULL WHERE reset_requested = 1;
SET users password NULL IF reset_requested = 1;
UPDATE users SET NULL password WHERE reset_requested = 1;
questions.answer: UPDATE users SET password = NULL WHERE reset_requested = 1;

questions.question: Update 'last_login' to current date where id = 10.
options: UPDATE users SET last_login = CURDATE() WHERE id = 10;
UPDATE users last_login NOW WHERE id = 10;
questions.answer: UPDATE users SET last_login = CURDATE() WHERE id = 10;

questions.question: Set 'stock' to 0 for products marked 'discontinued'.
options: UPDATE products SET stock = 0 WHERE status = 'discontinued';
UPDATE products WHERE status = 'discontinued' SET stock = 0;
questions.answer: UPDATE products SET stock = 0 WHERE status = 'discontinued';
